page.title: 14Employment in Our Area.
page.content: Most people travel out of our villages to work.In South Littleton most people travel between zero and five miles to work.The largest employer in this area is the prison service.Next comes light industry.The main jobs within the village are connected with the food and horticulture industries.People who work more than twenty five miles away are involved in heavy industry,trade and commerce.In Harvington village most people travel between zero and five miles,to work.The largest employers are the building trade,prison service and agriculture. Many mothers also go out to work.Some do part time casual work on the land. Other mothers have part time jobs such as dinner ladies, waitresses at Ragley Hall,playgroup leaders and hairdressers.My dad is in the prison service but mum does not work.
